message.title: Hello!
message.line1: Let's test the application in Bitrix24. Open the application in the slider.
Open each page in the top menu and see how everything works on it.
message.line2: Don't forget to play around with the color mode.

seo.title: Application settings
seo.description: Example of working with application settings.

error.title: Error
error.notAdmin: Only an administrator can edit application settings.

history.title: Operation history
history.alert: Demonstration of working with a property. Similarly, you can configure any application properties.
history.property: How many days to keep history

present.title: Event log
present.alert: Every employee login is displayed in the Event Log. You can always check who, when, and from which IP addresses logged into Bitrix24.

seo.title: User settings
seo.description: Example of working with application user settings.

demo.title: Example
demo.alert: Demonstration of working with a property. Similarly, you can configure any user properties.

message.line1: These are key tags for identifying, controlling, and diagnosing the application.

seo.title: License and payment
seo.description: Designation of the tariff plan with the region as a prefix.

message.line1: You can warn the user in advance about the renewal date.
message.license: tariff designation with the region as a prefix
message.isSelfHosted: flag indicating whether Bitrix24 is an on-premise or cloud version
message.isExpired: flag indicating whether the paid or trial period has expired
message.days: number of days remaining until the end of the paid period or trial period

message.line1: Here is the work of methods available in the application embedded via Frame.
message.line2: If you open the application settings and save them, you will see a push message on this page requiring a page refresh.
message.makeImCallToVideoDescription: use `$b24.parent.imCallTo(xxx, true)` to initiate a call
message.makeImCallToVoiceDescription: use `$b24.parent.imCallTo(xxx, false)` to initiate a call
message.makeImOpenMessengerDescription: use `$b24.parent.imOpenMessenger` to open a chat window

error.emptyNumber: Phone number for call is not specified.

seo.title: Special parameters
seo.description: List of special parameters for on-premise and cloud versions.

message.line1: There are several differences between the on-premise and cloud versions of Bitrix24.
message.isSelfHosted: flag indicating whether Bitrix24 is an on-premise or cloud version
message.primaryKeyIncrementValue: increment step for ID type fields

seo.title: I18n
seo.description: Demonstrates output of language messages depending on the Bitrix24 locale.

seo.title: Feedback form
seo.description: Examples of fields for a feedback form.

message.line1: You can embed a CRM form from your Bitrix24 into the application and pass special fields to it.
message.line2: When the user fills out the form, data about the application, tariff, etc. will be available in your Bitrix24.
message.payment_expired: flag indicating whether the paid or trial period has expired
message.days: number of days remaining until the end of the paid period or trial period
message.b24_plan: tariff designation with the region as a prefix

message.line1: Showing a formatted amount is very easy.

message1: The early bird catches the worm
message2: A picture is worth a thousand words
